title: Video: Amy Holford – Sunflower (The Amazing Sessions)
body: Filmed at the fantastic Evolution Emerging event earlier in the year, this stunning session comes courtesy of [Amazing Radio](http://amazingtunes.com/theamazingsessions/lukesitalsingh), featuring **Amy Holford**, the North East’s newest seductive songstress. Set against the backdrop of Blank Studios, it’s beautifully shot and magically performed by **Holford**. A song written for her grandad, and showcasing her delicate yet immensely powerful vocals, _Sunflower_ truly demonstrates the splendid talent this young songwriter possesses.
